title: Amarnath Yatra: 3rd batch of over 6,400 pilgrims leaves Jammu amid tight security
description: Over 6,400 pilgrims embarked on the Amarnath Yatra from Jammu on July 4th, marking the third batch of this year's pilgrimage.  The group included men, women, children, and religious leaders, traveling in a convoy of 291 vehicles under tight security.  This annual pilgrimage to the Amarnath cave shrine involves a challenging journey, and authorities ensure the safety and well-being of all participants.  The Yatra continues with multiple batches departing from Jammu, highlighting the significant religious importance of this event.  Further updates on the pilgrimage will be shared as they become available.
